page.title: 08Housing In Sealand.
page.content: There are all different kinds of houses,there are flats,semi-detached and new developments.The houses can be large for big families and small for just a small family.Houses can also have big windows and small windows and it can have big rooms and small rooms too.If you don't look after your house properly it can go scruffy.You're best to paint your house once in a while because the paint can come off.If you don't paint your house it can go mouldy and it would smell so it would be a good idea to wash all of your house and make sure it was clean.Old people have houses with no stairs so it won't be difficult for them,so their bed will be downstairs and not upstairs.You should have a new carpet every once in a while so that it will not go grubby.
